Not your language, email to help us
Choose one of backup files. Make sure the backup file is the latest.
Do not find backup database file.
All the saved data entries will be removed from database. Do you really want to do it?
Please link the app to Dropbox™ before restore
Please link the app to Dropbox™ before backup
Please link the app to Dropbox™ before enable auto backup
The app is unlinked to Dropbox™

"Link the app with Dropbox™. Please go to next screen to setup Dropbox™ link. You need to have Dropbox™ account and install Dropbox™ app
You can turn on automatically/manually backup database to your Dropbox™ For more information, please visit www.dropbox.com"
Please make sure the backup file is the latest. Otherwise, you may lose the newly saved data on the device.
Make sure your Internet is connected!
Cannot find pdf reader, install pdf reader and try again.
If you enjoy using %s, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
The trial version has expired, Please buy to continue using.
"App Serial ID: %s The trial version has expired. Please purchase or register license key to continue using this app."
Please buy and register license key to us this app.
"To register the app with your device, enter license key . To buy the pay version, click buy to pay version link. To order a license key, send email to us with serial ID %s."
Thank you to buy and registed the app. Your serial ID %s is registered with the following license key.
I want to purchase the register code. Here is my serial code %s.
Invalid license key. Please try again.
Your device serial ID is %s, please enter license key to register the app with your device.
Please buy and register the app.
Color value must be greater than 3 digits
Are you sure to delete tables?
Are you sure to delete categories?
Are you sure to delete items?
Are you sure to delete modifiers?
Fail, closing order before delete table.
Fail, closing order before deleting item.
Fail, closing order before deleting modifier.
Fail, closing order before deleting category.
Close time cannot be early than last close time
Close time cannot be same as last close time
Time cannot be same as last close time
Time cannot be early than last close time
"W&O POS Hong Kong Android Technology Co."
"Set your tablet to be same as printer's network, current network: %2$s, tablet IP address: %1$s"
We support tablet connect to printer by WIFI/LAN, Bluetooth, USB and PC-POS Printer Adapter.
The paper width should be multiple of eight, e.g 50mm -> 48mm.
"AADHK Room 1905, Nan Fung Centre Castle Peak Road, Tsuen Wan, HK Tel: 26180780"
Paper width <100 mm (If the width is wrong which may cause dislocation)
"Don't auto print when void order item"
Auto print when void order item
"Don't show void order item on receipt"
Show void order item on receipt
Connection fail, attach usb printer and allow permission!
Connection fail, check printer ip and network!
The restaurant logo width or height must be less than %1$s, Your logo Size is %2$s.
The paper width is larger than A4 210mm
Default password is 123456 for all accounts, Please change it. It is due to enhance login function.
Menu item is using the tax, cannot be set in empty.
From date should be same or before to date.
Having remaining amount in the split bill
Cannot update split bill, some bills are already paid
Cannot transfer order, having split bills
Cannot void order, having split bills
No action on order item, having split by item
The bill amount is over remaining %s
Print fail, please check printer setting!
Inventory is low, you have %s left
Order no. can be letters, numbers and dashes followed by numbers, e.g. A-00001
Not in same network, check the input ip and wifi!
Printer error, check printer and network.
Cannot connect to printer, check printer whether on and printer ip. Printer is unreachable.
Cannot connect to printer, check tablet wifi. Network is unreachable.
Cannot connect to printer, check computer firewall. Connection refused.
Cannot connect to printer, restart printer. Connection reset by printer.
Cannot connect to printer, check WnO Printer Adaper whether running and computer ip.
Cannot connect to printer, check printer port.

"%1$s file not found! Please put %1$s under \"%2$s\"."
"Please put table.csv under \"%s\" to import. Sample data in file: 101 102 103"
"Please put category.csv under \"%s\" to import. Sample data in file: Name Starters Sandwiches Drinks"
"Please put item.csv under \"%s\" to import. Sample data in file: Name, Price, Printer, Tax, MealSet Chicken Soup, 2.5, 2, 1, false Salad, 2.0, 2, 1, false Vegetarian, 2.0, 2, 1, false"
"Please put modifier.csv under \"%s\" to import. Sample data in file: Name, Price, type Lemon, 0.0, 1 Ice, 0.0, 2"

Supporting Bluetooth printer will be ready soon.
Your device should be Android 3.1 or higher.
Attach usb printer by Micro USB to USB adapter, and Android 3.1 or higher.

Item price will be displayed without the tax amount. Please check that the price of menu item.
Operation hours will be used in viewing report. You can set end time earlier than start time for pub operation hours.
The price schedule only work on same day. If the end time is in next day, you need to create another schedule.
The start time cannot be after end time.
